name: The 9th Gate
description: A girl goes missing. The voices are a-calling. Can you find her before they find you?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Intel Core i3 with 3.0ghz or 2 Core CPU with 3.0ghz or similar Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX650 or Above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Intel Core i5 with 2.8ghz or 4 Core CPU with 2.8ghz or similar Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1060 or Above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
